snippet.title: Your Path of Destruction for Quake - Level 1: Cloning Facility
snippet.description:
Your Path of Destruction aims to be a partial remake and a fan sequel to Doom 2, using the Quake engine.

Your Path of Destruction can be downloaded here - http://www.quaketerminus.com/mods/YPOD.zip

Though not required to run the mod, I'm playing Your Path of Destruction with the QuakeSpasm sourceport. Download the latest version here - http://quakespasm.sourceforge.net/

And, of course, you'll need a copy of Quake to run Your Path of Destruction. Quake is available on GoG and Steam:
GoG - https://www.gog.com/game/quake_the_offering
Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/2310/
